name: QrPngPaletteZoneOptions
summary: Palette overrides for specific QR zones.

properties.name: CenterPalette
properties.summary: Palette applied to a centered square zone.

properties.name: CenterSize
properties.summary: Center zone size in modules (0 = disabled).

properties.name: CornerPalette
properties.summary: Palette applied to the four corners.

properties.name: CornerSize
properties.summary: Corner zone size in modules (0 = disabled).
